i1.name: Prophet_of_an_Elder_God
description:
{{sbc|Innate:}} Periodically, '''Illaoi''' spawns a {{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}} on the nearest terrain perpendicular to her location, if no other Tentacles are already nearby it. Tentacles fully spawn after a 2 second delay and are {{tip|untargetable}} in the meantime.
{{as|Tentacles|buzzword2}} are commanded to attack by '''Illaoi's''' [[champion ability|abilities]].
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Periodically, Illaoi spawns a Tentacle on the nearest terrain perpendicular to her location, if no other Tentacles are already nearby it. Tentacles fully spawn after a 2 second delay and are untargetable in the meantime.
Tentacles are commanded to attack by Illaoi's champion ability.
See Illaoi/LoL#Pets for more details about Tentacles.

q1.name: Tentacle_Smash
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Illaoi''' slams down a {{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}} in the target direction.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Tentacle damage is increased.
Active: Illaoi slams down a Tentacle in the target direction.

w1.name: Harsh_Lesson
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Illaoi's''' next [[basic attack]] within 6 seconds gains {{sti|range|225 '''bonus''' range}} and causes her to {{tip|dash|leap}} to the target's location if they're beyond her normal basic attack range.

The attack deals {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}, with a minimum threshold, and capped at 300 against non-champions, and commands all {{as|Tentacles|buzzword2}} in range to attack the target. The minimum '''bonus''' damage can also be applied against {{tip|turrets}}.
''Harsh Lesson'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Illaoi's''' basic attack timer.
''Harsh Lesson can be activated during '''Illaoi's''' other abilities, other than while {{ai|E|Illaoi|pulling}} a {{as|Spirit|buzzword}}.''
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Illaoi's next basic attack within 6 seconds gains 225 bonus range and causes her to leap to the target's location if they're beyond her normal basic attack range.
The attack deals bonus physical damage, with a minimum threshold, and capped at 300 against non-champions, and commands all Tentacles in range to attack the target. The minimum bonus damage can also be applied against turrets.
Harsh Lesson resets Illaoi's basic attack timer.
Harsh Lesson can be activated during Illaoi's other abilities, other than while Illaoi's pulling a Spirit.
leveling:
{{st|Bonus Physical Damage|{{as|{{ap|3 to 5}}% {{as|(+ 4% per 100 AD)}} of target's '''maximum''' health|health}}}}
{{st|Minimum Physical Damage|{{ap|20 to 60}}}}

effects.str:
• Bonus Physical Damage: % (+ 4% per 100 AD) of target's maximum health
  • Minimum Physical Damage:

st_slices: % (+ 4% per 100 AD) of target's maximum health

e1.name: Test_of_Spirit
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Illaoi''' launches a tendril in the target direction that stops at the first enemy hit, pulling their {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} out in front of '''Illaoi''' over {{fd|0.75}} seconds if they're a {{tip|champion}}. The target is {{tip|tether|tethered}} to the {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} for {{tt|7 seconds|Timer starts when the target gets hit}}, {{tip|true sight|revealing}} them in addition to granting {{tip|sight}} of the area around them while the tether remains.

The {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} spawns with the target's {{sti|health|{{as|'''current''' health}}}}, {{sti|{{as|armor}}}} and {{sti|mr|{{as|magic resist}}}}, and redirects a portion of the {{tt|pre-mitigation damage|Damage calculated before modifiers}} received to the tethered champion.

When the {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} is killed or the target leaves tether range, the tether is severed, marking the target as a {{as|Vessel|buzzword3}} for 10 seconds and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 80% for {{fd|1.5}} seconds once the tether returns back to them. Each {{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}} autonomously attacks the closest {{as|Vessel|buzzword3}} or {{as|Spirit|buzzword}}, prioritizing the latter, once every {{pp|5.5 to 3.5 for 3|1 to 13|formula=5.5-1 every 6 lvls. Cooldown starts upon starting the slam}} seconds.

Enemies made a {{as|Vessel|buzzword3}} also spawn a {{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}} near themselves every {{pp|5 to 3 for 3|1 to 13}} seconds. {{as|Tentacles|buzzword2}} can spawn 250 units closer to each other than when spawned by '''Illaoi'''.

'''''Illaoi''' is {{tip|lockout|unable to act}} while firing the projectile and while the target's {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} is being pulled.''
'''''Illaoi''' cannot cast Test of Spirit again until the {{as|Spirit|buzzword}} dies.''
''{{as|Vessels|buzzword3}} can dispel the {{tip|debuff}} by scoring a {{tip|takedown}} against '''Illaoi'''.''
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Illaoi launches a tendril in the target direction that stops at the first enemy hit, pulling their Spirit out in front of Illaoi over 0.75 seconds if they're a champion. The target is tethered to the Spirit for 7 seconds, revealing them in addition to granting sight of the area around them while the tether remains.
The Spirit spawns with the target's current health, armor and magic resist, and redirects a portion of the pre-mitigation damage received to the tethered champion.
When the Spirit is killed or the target leaves tether range, the tether is severed, marking the target as a Vessel for 10 seconds and slowing them by 80% for 1.5 seconds once the tether returns back to them. Each Tentacle autonomously attacks the closest Vessel or Spirit, prioritizing the latter, once every 1 to 13 ‒ undefined seconds.
Enemies made a Vessel also spawn a Tentacle near themselves every 1 to 13 ‒ undefined seconds. Tentacles can spawn 250 units closer to each other than when spawned by Illaoi.
Illaoi is unable to act while firing the projectile and while the target's Spirit is being pulled.
Illaoi cannot cast Test of Spirit again until the Spirit dies.
Vessels can dispel the debuff by scoring a takedown against Illaoi.

effects.str: • Damage Transmission: % (+ 8% per 100 AD)

r1.name: Leap_of_Faith
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Illaoi''' gains {{tip|displacement immunity}} and leaps into the air for the cast time. She then slams her idol into the ground, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to nearby enemies. For each enemy champion hit, a {{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}} is summoned for 8 seconds (up to a maximum of 6 summons).

For the duration, {{ais|Harsh Lesson|Illaoi}} {{sti|cooldown}} is halved, all {{as|Tentacles|buzzword2}} awakened by '''Illaoi''' are {{tip|untargetable}}, will not show their hitboxes, nor go dormant, and will take half the amount of time to make an attack. This however does not affect the {{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}} attack from {{ai|Q|Illaoi}}.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Illaoi gains displacement immunity and leaps into the air for the cast time. She then slams her idol into the ground, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies. For each enemy champion hit, a Tentacle is summoned for 8 seconds (up to a maximum of 6 summons).
For the duration, Illaoi's Harsh Lesson cooldown is halved, all Tentacles awakened by Illaoi are untargetable, will not show their hitboxes, nor go dormant, and will take half the amount of time to make an attack. This however does not affect the Tentacle attack from Illaoi's Q.
r1.notes:
{{Effect at cast time end}}
* '''Illaoi''' spawns the '''''{{ai|Prophet of an Elder God|Illaoi|{{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}}}''''' 700 range away from her, unless there's a natural wall blocking the way making the '''''{{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}''''' spawn on it, with an angle relative to the direction she's facing.
** 1+ champions: one {{ai|Prophet of an Elder God|Illaoi|{{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}}} at 0 degrees. (towards '''Illaoi's''' facing direction)
** 2+ champions: one {{ai|Prophet of an Elder God|Illaoi|{{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}}} at 60 degrees.
** 3+ champions: one {{ai|Prophet of an Elder God|Illaoi|{{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}}} at 300 degrees.
** 4+ champions: one {{ai|Prophet of an Elder God|Illaoi|{{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}}} at 120 degrees.
** 5+ champions: one {{ai|Prophet of an Elder God|Illaoi|{{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}}} at 240 degrees.
** 6+ champions: one {{ai|Prophet of an Elder God|Illaoi|{{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}}} at 180 degrees.
** '''Illaoi's''' facing direction is decided by the position of the cursor on cast, but can also be changed mid-cast through other effects, such as {{si|Flash}}.
** If there are no walls nearby, spawning the last {{ai|Prophet of an Elder God|Illaoi|{{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}}} will form a perfect hexagon.
* {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} will block the ability's damage but will not prevent '''''{{as|Tentacles|buzzword2}}''''' from spawning.
* If '''Illaoi''' {{tip|death|dies}} within {{fd|0.25}} seconds of dropping down, she will spawn buffed '''''{{as|Tentacles|buzzword2}}''''', but she won't manage in time to buff the already spawned ones. {{bug|1|Added undocumented on 9.13}}
* If '''Illaoi''' is near a '''''{{as|Tentacle|buzzword2}}''''' that is about to spawn, it will spawn buffed by ''Leap of Faith'' even if '''Illaoi''' is no longer nearby.
* Using ''{{ai|Harsh Lesson|Illaoi}}'' after '''Illaoi''' drops down will command '''''{{as|Tentacles|buzzword2}}''''' to instantly attack, regardless if they were already attacking. Their old attack will keep on going and will hit while the second attack is on its animation attack. {{bug|1}}
** This makes it possible for the same tentacle to reduce its own damage by having the second attack hit too fast, which is not otherwise possible.
* Using ''{{ai|Harsh Lesson|Illaoi}}'' an instant before ''Leap of Faith's'' buff finishes will delay the '''''{{as|Tentacle's|buzzword2}}''''' attack. {{bug|1}}
